deals.highlightsHtml: Weekly shopping lists showcase flavorful, healthy recipes customized by store, diet & price, all in time for postholiday fitness kicks
deals.announcementTitle: Half Off Year of Online Meal Planning
deals.title: $29 for 12 Months of Online Meal Planning from E-Mealz ($58 Value)
deals.finePrint: Limit 1 per person, may buy 4 additional as gifts. Must activate by 8/15/12, program expires 12 months from activation date.
deals.pitchHtml:
Much like composing a will, composing a grocery list requires the foresight to know what your kids will want. Outsource an unpleasant task with today's Groupon: for $29, you get 12 months of online meal planning from E-Mealz (a $58 value).

Endorsed by financial author Dave Ramsey and highlighted on Oprah Winfrey's Life Lift blog, E-Mealz charts out a week's worth of dollar- and healthy-savvy dinner recipes to relieve the burden of kitchen-related stress. Each week, organized grocery lists—customized by family size, dietary desires, and store preferences—showcase flavorful culinary creations for discerning palates. Plans developed by working parents capitalize on sale items at stores such as Wal-Mart and Kroger, and an "any store" list can be used to navigate the aisles of other favored grocers. Family meal plans serve seven meals for three to six people, whereas plans for two are tailored to singles, couples, or a pair of sock puppets on a date atop a chest of drawers.

Special vegetarian, gluten-free, low-carb, low-fat, and portion-controlled meal-plan options aid nongeneric eaters in assembling targets for their teeth and postholiday fitness regimens. The Wal-Mart family plan supplies culinary sustenance to families of three to six for an average weekly cost of $75–$85 and takes advantage of the store's regularly discounted prices. A duo can fill a Publix cart for $35–$45 a week, including side dishes.

Born of founder Jane DeLaney's desire to feed her family stress-free dinners provisioned from an organized list without coupons, E-Mealz allows shoppers to spend more time at the table and less time wandering about the grocery store uttering monophonic 10th-century chants in dismay.

says.emailContent: Are all curses actually just remedies for hubris?
says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Motivational Mottos
says.websiteContentHtml:
Whether you're feeling so low that you're down in the dumps or feeling so sensational that you're up in the dumps, you'll feel better after repeating a motivational mantra to yourself. Seek success with these proven maxims:

• "Go for the gold!"
• "Live your best life!"
• "Is that gold from earlier making, like, a 'whirring' noise?"
• "Be the change you want to see!"
• "Dang! That gold is hot to the touch … just like I should be."
• "Everyone who looks at the gold starts bleeding. We have to get rid of it."
• "The pawn-shop owner's dog hissed at the gold and when the owner screamed at us, I noticed his mouth had 100 teeth in it."
• "I told the police, 'The gold burned down my house! It was the gold!' but they wouldn't listen!"
• "Is this what you wanted, gold? To see me reduced to nothing?"
• "I buried the gold in cement at a construction zone, but didn't notice the sign reading 'Future Site of The Center for Hubris Studies.'"
• "Settle for silver."

options.title: E-Mealz

details.description: Limit 1 per person, may buy 4 additional as gifts. Must activate by 8/15/12, program expires 12 months from activation date.

deals.highlightsHtml: Easy-to-use online system allows guests to create custom Valentine's Day mugs & cards using full-color personal pictures & text
deals.announcementTitle: Zazzle.com - Half Off Custom Mugs and Cards
deals.title: Custom Valentine's Day Mugs or Cards from Zazzle.com (Half Off)
deals.finePrint: Limit 5 per person, may buy 5 additional as gifts. Limit 1 per visit. Valid only for option purchased. Online only. Not valid in Canada. Shipping not included. Not valid with other offers. Must order by 2/10 for two-day shipping to receive by Valentine's Day. $40 minimum purchase required.
deals.pitchHtml:
Everybody loves Valentine's Day, when talented Family Ties actor Scott Valentine comes into your house and kisses you in your sleep. Don't forget to leave milk and sushi out with today's Groupon to Zazzle.com. Choose between the following options:

  • For $20, you get $40 worth of customizable Valentine's Day mugs.
  • For $20, you get $40 worth of customizable Valentine's Day cards.

Using Zazzle.com's intuitive online design tools, customers can personalize and create their own mugs and cards with self-uploaded pictures and self-authored text. Custom mugs—available in eight different shapes, colors, and sizes—arrive in the form of classic ceramic mugs, steins, stainless-steel travel mugs, or frosted glasses and are adorned with personal messages, photos, or scanned receipts from your first date. Otherwise, a selection of fully customizable Valentine's Day cards can sport classic hearts and flower imagery alongside the words of your choosing. Zazzle.com's handy technicians then print the gifts—usually within 24 hours—using vibrant, full-color inks poached from Cupid’s pet squids.

To receive custom gifts by Valentine's Day, orders must be placed by February 5 with standard shipping. Half-off two-day express shipping is available for orders of $50 or more through February 8.

deals.highlightsHtml: Thick & supportive eco-friendly memory foam mattress made with soy-based materials encased in hypoallergenic velour cover.
deals.announcementTitle: $499 for a Full or Queen Memory Foam Mattress
deals.title: $499 for a Full or Queen Nature's Dream Memory Foam Mattress (Up to $1,299 Value). Shipping Included.
deals.finePrint: Limit 1 per person, may buy 3 additional as gifts. Valid only for option purchased. Must provide name and shipping address at checkout, which will be provided along with your Groupon login email to Mattress Hero to facilitate shipping. Online only. No returns unless defective or damaged. Includes shipping. Ships within contiguous U.S. only. Does not ship to PO boxes. Ships out in 2-6 weeks from purchase date. Goods sold by Groupon Goods.
deals.pitchHtml:
What You Get

  • For $499, you get a 10-inch Nature's Dream memory foam mattress, available in the following sizes:
    • Queen-size (a $1,299 value)
    • Full-size (a $1,199 value)
  • Shipping is included.

Overview

Nature's Dream mattresses hug horizontal humans with 10 cushy inches of eco-friendly high-density memory foam that contours deeply to support all body types. Below the hypoallergenic velour cover lies a 2.5-inch layer of foam blended with a soy bio-application for increased breathability. And below that, a thick, durable support layer helps slumbering citizens retain citizenship and voting rights in the land of dreams. Aside from providing comfort, the mattress's thick layers of memory foam greatly reduce motion transfer, which leads to more uninterrupted sleep for couples and fewer concussions for jumping monkeys.

Features

  • Supportive memory foam 
  • Soy-based materials 
  • Minimized motion transfer 
  • Hypoallergenic velour cover 
  • Proprietary blend greatly reduces heat and cratering issues 
  • Click here for a full list of specifications

How to Get Your Goods

Step 1.
Purchase your Groupon using the buy button on this page.

Step 2.
No need to do anything else! By purchasing this Groupon and providing your name and shipping address, you've completed the order for your Memory-Foam Mattress and it should ship within 2-6 weeks.

Step 3.
Enjoy!

deals.highlightsHtml: Wine four-pack with white, semi-sparkling rose, sweet red & chocolate- infused varietal makes romantic Valentine's Day gift
deals.title: $29 for a Four-Bottle Romantic Wine Package from Vino Bazaar ($54.96 Value)
deals.finePrint: Limit 2/person, may buy 3 add'l as gifts. Redemption code expires 2/26/12. If not redeemed by then, Groupon will refund amount paid in Groupon credit or original form of payment, as requested. Must be 21 or older; signature required at delivery. Extra $9.95 fee for shipping. Does not ship to AK, AR, DE, HI, KS, KY, MD, MA, MS, MT, NH, NY, NC, OH, OK, PA, RI, SD, TN, TX, UT, WV, VA, or Canada. Ships out in 7-10 business days from redemption date. Additional fine print
deals.pitchHtml:
What You Get

  • For $29, you get four bottles of wine from Vino Bazaar (a $54.96 value). The four-pack features the following bottles:
    • 2010 Zonin pinot grigio (an $11.99 value)
    • Chocolais (an $11.99 value)
    • 2010 Black Tower pink bubbly (a $17.99 value)
    • Rose's sweet red (a $12.99 value)

  • Shipping is additional $9.95 per four-pack of wine.
  • Shipping is not guaranteed by Valentine's Day.
  • Ships to select states only (see the fine print).

Visit the Groupon Goods FAQ for more info.

Overview

Vino Bazaar's romantic wine pack expands fermented fruit horizons with four eclectic selections. A fruity Zonin pinot grigio boasts subtle scents of white flowers and green apples, and a Black Tower pink bubbly from Germany wets whistles and moistens kazoos with a semi-sparkling rose blended from 100% cabernet. Both the delicate Rose's sweet red and the Chocolais, infused with Swiss chocolate and Dutch cream, conclude an elegant meal or Valentine's Day with a burst of sweetness rivaled only by water balloons filled with maple syrup.

Features

  • 2010 Zonin pinot grigio with hints of exotic fruit
  • 2010 Black Tower pink bubbly made from cabernet and effervescent bubbles sourced from natural seltzer geysers
  • Chocolais blends fine Italian wine with Swiss chocolate and thick Dutch cream
  • Rose's sweet red vinified in stainless steel to preserve the natural flavors of ripe Spanish grapes

How to Get Your Goods

Step 1.
Purchase your Groupon using the buy button on this page.

Step 2.
Pull up your Groupon with our mobile app or by going to My Groupons (or to My Gifts if you are giving this as a gift*) and clicking the view voucher link.

Step 3.
Visit redemption site, select 'Add to Cart' and choose to either register an account or check out as a guest. Fill in billing and shipping details, confirm flat-rate shipping, and enter the redemption number located in the center of your Groupon into the 'Redeem a Gift Certificate or Coupon' field and click 'Apply'.

Step 4.
Enjoy!

*Once the recipient claims your gift, you will no longer be able to print the Groupon.

deals.highlightsHtml: MP3 player displays crisp detail on 3-inch color touchscreen or outputs video to TV & songs blast from stored music or built-in FM radio
deals.announcementTitle: 77% Off a V-Touch Pro 4GB Video MP3 Player
deals.title: $35 for a V-Touch Pro 4GB Video MP3 Player with Built-In FM Radio ($149 Value)
deals.finePrint: Limit 1 per person. Valid only for option purchased. Must provide name and shipping address at checkout, which will be provided along with your Groupon login email to Visual Land to facilitate shipping. Online only. Any return must occur within 14 days of receiving goods. Extra $3 fee for shipping. Ships within contiguous U.S. only. Does not ship to PO boxes. Ships out in 10-14 business days from purchase date. Goods sold by Groupon Goods.
deals.pitchHtml:
What You Get

  • For $35, you get a V-Touch Pro 4GB video MP3 player (a $149 value). Choose from the following colors:
    • Black
    • Blue
    • Red
    • White
    • Purple
  • In the box:
    • One pair of ear buds
    • USB cable for computer linking
    • Instruction booklet
  • An additional $3 shipping fee will be charged at checkout for each option.

Orders fulfilled by Visual Land. Visit the Groupon Goods FAQ for more info.

Overview

The V-Touch Pro 4GB video MP3 player stores music, movies, photos, and e-books in a sleek digital library free of mocking Dewey decimal card catalogs. The built-in 4 gigabytes of memory store a wide range of audio and video formats. The player's 3-inch color touchscreen display illuminates images in sharp resolution; movies or photos may also leap to larger screens through a video output. A built-in FM radio, which grants an alternative to cycling through the complete discography of a humpback whale, can be pumped through a headphone jack or an internal speaker. The slim device also packs a 2-megapixel camera into its frame, letting users snap pics or record footage with ease.

Features

  • 3-inch color touchscreen display
  • Output for playing video on TVs
  • 4-gigabytes of flash memory expandable through MicroSD card slot
  • Built-in speaker
  • 2-megapixel camera captures stills and video
  • FM radio keeps users aware of alien invasions
  • Click here for additional information on the V-Touch Pro 4GB video MP3 player

How to Get Your Goods

Step 1.
Purchase your Groupon using the buy button on this page.

Step 2.
No need to do anything else! By purchasing this Groupon and providing your name and shipping address, you've completed the order for your Video MP3 Player and it should ship within 10-14 business days.

Step 3.
Enjoy!

deals.highlightsHtml: Mobile detailing service attends to cars, vans, trucks or SUVs, washing & waxing vehicles wherever they’re parked
deals.announcementTitle: Up to Half Off Mobile Auto-Detailing Service
deals.title: Semi or Full Detail for a Car or Van, Truck, or SUV from Get M.A.D. Mobile Auto Detailing (Up to Half Off)
deals.finePrint: Limit 4 per person, may buy 4 additional as gifts. Limit 1 per visit. Valid only for option purchased. Valid only within 25mi of downtown Youngstown. Extra fee for over-sized vehicles.
deals.pitchHtml:
Although their thick wool coats would make them ideal car washers, sheep are rarely able to maintain the position because of costly hoof scratches and a tendency to eat air fresheners. Enjoy bipedal auto-polishing with today's Groupon to Get M.A.D. Mobile Auto Detailing. Crew members of this mobile automobile-cleaning service will travel to your home or office, provided it is within 25 miles of downtown Youngstown. Choose one of the following options depending on the size of your ride and the direness of its state (each option includes the $20 gas fee):

  • For $59, you get semi-detail for a car (a $119 value).
  • For $64, you get semi-detail for a van, truck, or SUV (a $129 value).
  • For $89, you get full detail for a car (up to a $179 value).
  • For $99, you get full detail for a van, truck, or SUV (up to a $209 value).

The top-notch detailing services are performed by a traveling staff of cleansing experts who are highly trained in the lost art of hand washing and hand drying. Following a spray wax, a thorough interior cleaning will spiff up your ride’s inside with a vacuuming, doorjamb degunking, mat spot cleaning, air-vent dusting, and window resparkling. The exterior will have its bugs wicked off and its rubbery soles shined with a tire gloss. Auto owners opting for the full detailing will also net their ride a lustrous hand waxing, renewed trim, a full shampoo treatment for its weary carpets and mats, and newly cleaned and conditioned seats to prevent awkward pants-sticking incidents.

Pick up an extra Groupon and give the gift of a remastered car, or hang on to it and rekindle a high-octane relationship somewhere down the line. Further services and upgrades to the semidetail are available at an additional cost, invariably leading to a striking pavement prowler that will turn more heads in parking lots than a neighborhood strongman juggling shopping carts.

Though Get M.A.D. Mobile Auto Detailing sometimes features a discounted price online for full-detailing services, this Groupon still offers the best deal available.

says.emailContent: Are ghost detectors now affordable for every home?
says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Scientific Ghost Hunting
says.websiteContentHtml:
Before the discovery of electricity, ghost hunters had to rely on intuition, dubious séance guides, and that unmistakable “ghost smell.” What modern equipment is now available to science-minded spirit seekers?

• Fright-vision goggles

• Five-hour bravery pills

• Infrared vengefulness scanners

• Google Murders

• Machine that converts television static into directions to where treasure is buried

• Ghost detector

deals.highlightsHtml: Federal-style hotel combines early 19th-century panache with modern conveniences, minutes from Niagara Falls
deals.title: One-or Two-Night Stay for Two with Spa or Dinner Credit at Barton Hill Hotel & Spa in New York
deals.finePrint: Must complete travel by 4/30. Not valid 2/3-2/4 or 2/10-2/14. Limit 4 per person, may by 4 more as gifts for Sun-Thu option. Limit 1 per person, may buy 1 more as a gift for Fri-Sat options. Limit 5 per visit (may use up to 4 Sun-Thu options with up to 1 Fri-Sat option per visit). Valid only for option purchased. 48hr cancel notice or fee of applicable 1-night's stay up to the amount paid for Groupon applies. Must be 21+ to check in. Valid for Riverview Retreat king room. 12% tax & gratuity not included.
deals.pitchHtml:
Federal-Style Boutique Hotel Facing Niagara River

Jimmy Carter once called Lewiston "the most historic square mile in America,” alluding to the town's critical role in the War of 1812. Nearly 200 years ago in Lewiston—on the grounds where Barton Hill Hotel & Spa now stands—American soldiers staged the war's first major battle. Located on the Niagara River, just about 6 miles from Niagara Falls, the newly built, Federal-style hotel pays homage to the area's storied past while embracing contemporary comforts.

Stately columns and Greek Revival furniture lend an elegant feel to the hotel's great room. The guest rooms blend together antique and modern elements, such as poster beds, gas fireplaces, iPod docking stations, and a spinning jenny with USB inputs. The Riverview Retreat rooms overlook the Niagara River. Each morning, guests can make their way to the hotel banquet room to enjoy a continental breakfast spread that includes eggs, sausage, bacon, and hash browns.

Flowing curtains and soothing earth tones help usher in a tranquil atmosphere at the Spa at Barton Hill. In the spa, specialists will pamper visitors with anything from a classic Swedish massage ($80 for 50 minutes) and manicure ($25) to an exotic Black Baltic mud wrap ($90 for 50 minutes). The $25 credit included in this deal may be used either at the spa or for dinner at the in-house Chantry Restaurant, where an experienced chef prepares gourmet cuisine such as homestyle beef stew and pan-seared tilapia.

Lewiston, New York: Historical Streets Minutes from Niagara Falls and Wineries

Lewiston was one of western New York's earliest settlements, dating back to the 1600s. Today, its quaint streets are lined with antique stores and art galleries. One can learn about America's early years at historical sites throughout the region, including Old Fort Niagara, which stands atop a bluff overlooking Lake Ontario about 6 miles north of the hotel. The famous French and Indian War site is now a state park that conducts reenactments and features a museum lined with engaging exhibits and military artifacts.

The majestic Niagara Falls resides about 10 minutes south of the hotel. Each second, 600,000 gallons of water cascade over the brink, sending a cool mist into the air; come winter, this mist frosts the evergreen trees in the Niagara Falls State Park, transforming the area into a real-life Fortress of Solitude.

Barton Hill Hotel can set up guests on winery tours on the Niagara Wine Trail, which resides just about a 10-minute drive away. The area is best known for its ice wine—a sweet dessert varietal made from frozen grapes, some of which once served as eyeballs of snowmen who registered as organ donors.

deals.highlightsHtml: Rustic lodge between Geneva Lake & Lake Como with spa, steak house & indoor pool
deals.announcementTitle: Rustic Lodge on Shores of Lake Como
deals.title: One- or Two-Night Stay for Up to Four in a Resort-Side Room at The Lodge at Geneva Ridge in Lake Geneva
deals.finePrint: Must travel by 5/25/12. Not valid 3/21-3/25. Limit 2/person for 1-night stay, may buy 2 more as gifts. Limit 1/person for 2-night stay. Valid only for option purchased. Subject to availability. 72hr cancellation notice required or fee of applicable 1-night stay up to amount paid for Groupon applies. Must be 21+ to check in or consume alcohol. Must provide full name at checkout, which will be provided to property. Credit card required at check-in. Not valid with reward points. $10 resort fee not included.
deals.pitchHtml:
Lakefront Lodge with Panoramic Views and Hearty Steakhouse

Lake Geneva is sometimes called "The Hamptons of the Midwest," a designation associated with the summertime, when throngs of boaters and beachgoers flock to the resort area. But when the chris-crafts are stored for the winter and the beach volleyball nets come down, there's still no shortage of activity around Lake Geneva. Ice skaters crisscross public rinks, downhill skiers take to the slopes, and snowmobiles cut through the woods and across the frozen lakes, where ice fishers land walleye and northern pike. The Lake Geneva area thrives as a year-round mecca for outdoor adventure, catered by rustic-style luxury properties such as The Lodge at Geneva Ridge. Overlooking neighboring Lake Como, the lodge offers seclusion a few minutes' walk from Geneva Lake's north shore.

The Lodge at Geneva Ridge's lakefront vistas are best appreciated at the onsite Lakeview Grille, where wall-to-wall picture windows frame wooded slopes and the shores of Lake Como. In the kitchen, chefs hand-carve rib eyes, fillets, and prime ribs and prepare Friday-night fish fry ($10.95/person). Next door, the Lakeview Lounge offers equally impressive vistas in a lodge setting with a stacked stone fireplace and an oak bar with a brass runner, where bartenders mix specialty cocktails tailored to each patron's id.

Upstairs, resort-side king or two-queen rooms carry on the lodge atmosphere with mission-style wood furnishings. Despite the rustic touches, a stay at The Lodge at Geneva Ridge hardly means roughing it. Specialists at the onsite spa and salon draw from Swedish, Native American, Indian, and Japanese therapeutic traditions to craft a full range of massages and skin treatments, and a sauna and steam room chase away any winter chill.

Lake Geneva, Wisconsin: Winter Sports and Historical Museums

Winters in Lake Geneva are decidedly quieter than summers, and in addition to a host of outdoor activities, winter brings with it the benefit of smaller crowds. Snowshoers and cross-country skiers trek through ice-frosted bare groves along the Geneva Lake Shore Path, and ice fishers set up colorful shanties on the lake's frozen surface. Snowmobilers also careen along county trails, and March 16–18 brings the grand finale of the Amsoil Championship Snocross Series to town as professionals soar over elevated jumps and blindfolded snowmen.

There's also plenty for families to do indoors. The Geneva Lake Museum takes visitors back in time with re-created 19th-century shops, and the 1897-era Yerkes Observatory holds the world's largest refracting telescope, which has the capability of reading the bottom line of a Snellen chart pinned to moon.

deals.highlightsHtml: Eco-friendly hotel with luxurious spa, saline pool & swan lagoon on banks of Sacramento River
deals.title: One- or Two-Night Stay for Up to Four with Dining or Spa Credit at Gaia Shasta Hotel in Northern California
deals.finePrint: Must complete travel by 5/29/12. Limit 2 per person, may buy 2 additional as gifts. Limit 2 per visit. Valid only for option purchased. Subject to availability. Cancellation notice required by 3PM on day prior to arrival or fee up to Groupon price applies. Must be 18 or older to check in. Valid for a standard king or double-queen room. Credit card required at check-in. Dining credit not valid toward the purchase of alcohol. Not valid with reward points. 10% tax not included.
deals.pitchHtml:
Serene, Eco-Friendly Hotel on Banks of Sacramento River

Gaia Shasta Hotel strives to maintain harmony with its natural environment. Out front, desert brush borders a lagoon filled with swans and colorful koi fish, and the Sacramento River flows by just steps away. Gaia's commitment to eco-friendly practices is evident throughout the hotel. Natural spa treatments incorporate herbs and elderberries grown onsite, and tubular skylights help to save energy by diffusing sunlight throughout the interior.

Guest rooms are decorated in neutral earth tones, and picture windows afford ample views of the Sacramento River and surrounding woodlands. Outdoors, a relaxing whirlpool spa is purified using natural saline instead of chlorine or other chemicals. The onsite Lotus Spa offers invigorating body wraps and hot-stone massages for weary backs or stressed-out pet rocks.

At the hotel's restaurant, Woodside Grill, chef Gregory McChristian prepares Cajun chicken fettuccine ($14) and hand-cut Woodside fillet ($28) culled from ranches in the area. Breakfast options include french toast ($8) made with a rustic baguette. Adhering to Gaia's earth-friendly, socially conscious mission, the eatery composts leftovers and regularly donates food to local families in need.

Anderson, California: Quiet Town Amid Sacramento Valley's Natural Grandeur

Situated along the Sacramento River in northern California's Sacramento Valley, Anderson is an ideal outpost for exploring nearby lakes, waterfalls, and backcountry trails. Kayaking and whitewater rafting are popular on the river, and skiers flock to Mount Shasta, located about an hour's drive away. Closer to Anderson, the bustling city of Redding boasts authentic Mexican restaurants, historical museums, and Sundial Bridge, which spans the river and rivals Andre the Giant's wristwatch as one of the world's largest timepieces.

deals.highlightsHtml: Home-brewing kit quick starts batches of ales, lagers & stouts with premium hops, yeasts & grains as well as easy recipes
deals.announcementTitle: Up to Half Off Beer Brewing Kit
deals.title: $64 for a Beer-Making Starter Kit and Ingredients from Midwest Homebrewing and Winemaking Supplies (Up to $127.80 Value)
deals.finePrint: Limit 1 per person, may buy 1 additional as a gift. Limit 1 per order. Online only. Extra fee for shipping. Valid only in continental U.S.
deals.pitchHtml:
During Prohibition, bootleggers made their own booze by burying grapes underground or catching moonbeams in a jar of water. Make alcohol the easy way with today's Groupon: for $64, you get a first-time brewer's package from Midwest Homebrewing and Winemaking Supplies (up to a $138.80 total value). The package includes:

  • A brewing essentials equipment kit (a $56.95 value)
  • A steel bottle opener (a $14.95 value)
  • Choice of an irish red ale, an autumn amber ale, or an irish stout ingredient kit (up to a $27.99 value)
  • An instructional DVD (a $4.95 value)
  • A $25 gift certificate for a second batch

A $12 shipping fee is not included in the price of this Groupon.

The hops hobbyists at Midwest Homebrewing and Winemaking Supplies provide equipment and encouragement to aspiring beverage crafters nationwide. Unlike puzzle-piece-of-the-month clubs, the brewing essentials equipment kit provides everything a first-time brewer needs in one handy package, except for bottles and the brew kettle itself. Ingredient kits yield 5-gallon liquid harvests in flavors such as irish red ale, a richly colored, aromatic quaff popular among home brewers and discerning drinkers. Autumn amber ale provides a roasty seasonal sip, and irish stout sports a rich bittersweet brew topped with a creamy head. Whatever the favored flavor, Midwest's premium ingredients and handy 90-minute how-to DVD help to make consistent batches each time, aiding neophyte brewers in avoiding the embarrassment of turning out a spicy pilsner or bacon-flavored lager. Suds designers can continue to hone their skills by using the $25 gift certificate for the next ingredient kit.

says.emailContent: Are music notes a form of orthodontia?
says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Urban Murals
says.websiteContentHtml:
Urban murals are the best art because they're the biggest art. Here are some of the most inspiring scenes that can be found in every urban mural:

• Children with huge smiles full of music notes instead of teeth

• Citizens of all races holding hands in a chain to block a bulldozer that is approaching a hospital

• A crack in the sidewalk—inside it, there's a family having dinner

• Two old women playing chess for once

• All of the city's past mayors lifting a school bus full of sick zoo animals

• Roses sprouting out of guns, being watered by a blind man with a baby on his shoulders

deals.highlightsHtml: Choppers zip through indoor environments, drawing envious glances with sleek, colorful bodies & precision responses to remote controls
deals.title: $29 for a Remote-Controlled SF161 Helicopter or R73-OPS Attack Helicopter ($49.99 Value)
deals.finePrint: Limit 1 per person. Must provide name and shipping address at checkout, which will be provided along with your Groupon login email to Estes-Cox Corporation to facilitate shipping. Valid only for option purchased. Online only. Any return must occur within 14 days of receiving goods. Ships to all 50 states. Extra $5 fee for shipping. Does not ship to PO boxes. Ships out in 7-10 business days from purchase date. Goods sold by Groupon Goods.
deals.pitchHtml:
What You Get

  • For $29, you get a remote-controlled Estes helicopter (a $49.99 value). Choose between the following models:
    • SF161 helicopter in red and white
    • R73-OPS attack helicopter in military green
  • In the box:
    • The fully assembled mini helicopter of your choosing
    • 3.7V lithium-polymer battery
    • 3.5-channel infrared controller; requires six AA batteries (not included)
    • Instructions and warranty
  • Helicopters are recommended for ages 14 and older and are meant for indoor use only.
  • An additional $5 shipping fee will be charged at checkout for each option.

To get this deal, use the buy button on this page. Visit the Groupon Goods FAQ for more info.

Overview

The SF161 helicopter and R73-OPS attack helicopter are a high-flying fun time for aspiring aviators and teenagers who want to be an eagle when they grow up. The SF161's bright red body draws admiring gazes as it zips through indoor environments, and the more subdued forest-green of the R73-OPS allows the chopper to covertly infiltrate any dollhouse or blanket fort. Both whirlybirds arrive full assembled and ready to receive over-the-air orders from a precision infrared remote.

Features

  • Fully assembled models
  • Designed for indoor flight
  • Infrared remote control for dodging from lovelorn hummingbirds
  • Recommended for ages 14 and older
  • SF161 dimensions: 8.6'' L x 1.4'' W x 3.9'' H
  • R73-OPS dimensions: 8.6'' L x 2.8'' W x 3.7'' H
  • Click here for more information on the SF161 helicopter and R73-OPS attack helicopter.

How to Get Your Goods

Step 1.
Purchase your Groupon using the buy button on this page.

Step 2.
No need to do anything else! By purchasing this Groupon and providing your name, shipping address, and email address, you've completed the order for your RC Helicopter and it should ship within 7-10 business days.

Step 3.
Enjoy!

deals.title: Boys' or Girls' Kelty Star Gazer 45 Sleeping Bags (Up to 70% Off)
deals.finePrint: Limit 1 per person. Valid only for option purchased. Must provide name and shipping address at checkout, which will be provided along with your Groupon login email to Texsport.net to facilitate shipping. Online only. Any return must occur within 14 days of receiving goods. Ships within contiguous US only. Extra $5 fee for shipping. Does not ship to PO boxes. Ships out in 7-14 business days from purchase date. deals.pitchHtml:
What You Get

  • For $20, you get one kids' Kelty Star Gazer 45 sleeping bag (a $30 value). Choose between the following options:
    • Boys' sleeping bag in orange.
    • Girls' sleeping bag in purple.

  • For $35, you get two Kelty Star Gazer 45 sleeping bags (a $60 value). Choose between the following options:
    • One boys' sleeping bag in orange and one girls' sleeping bag in purple.
    • Two boys' sleeping bags in orange.
    • Two girls' sleeping bags in purple.

  • An additional $5 shipping fee will be charged at checkout for each option.

To get this deal, use the buy button on this page. Visit the Groupon Goods FAQ for more info.

Overview

The Kelty Star Gazer 45's lightweight, kid-friendly design allows young explorers 10 and older to quickly pack up and go after any overnight stay at a slumber party or campsite. The polyester, water-resistant sleep sack has an attached pillow pocket that is sized to fit a small travel pillow. An external storage pouch allows for the storage of books, reading lights, and loose french fries.

Features

  • Water-resistant, polyester sleeping bag
  • Removable duffle bag for swift toting
  • Two-way zipper for dramatic exits
  • Appropriate for kids aged 10 and older
  • External storage pocket
  • Includes pocket for a pillow
  • Shell material: polyester
  • Lining material: 100% polyester
  • Fill material: 100% polyester fiber
  • Fill material weight: 1 pound
  • Dimensions: 60" L x 26" W x 2 "H
  • Care and cleaning: Spot-clean only

How to Get Your Goods

Step 1.
Purchase your Groupon using the buy button on this page.

Step 2.
No need to do anything else! By purchasing this Groupon and providing your name and shipping address, you've completed the order for your Kelty Star Gazer 45 and it should ship within 7-10 business days.

Step 3.
Enjoy!

details.description: Limit 1 per person. Valid only for option purchased. Must provide name and shipping address at checkout, which will be provided along with your Groupon login email to Texsport.net to facilitate shipping. Online only. Any return must occur within 14 days of receiving goods. Ships within contiguous US only. Extra $5 fee for shipping. Does not ship to PO boxes. Ships out in 7-14 business days from purchase date. Goods sold by Groupon Goods.
